channel.title: I wana make non wild area how?

item.title: I wana make non wild area how?
item.dc:creator: @omarhameed1 omarhameed1
item.description:
@omarhameed1 wrote:

first open your client.java
ctrl+f and find

public boolean nonWild() {

youll see this sorta stuff

(absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) ||
now to add 1 go to the place you want non wild and find SW most coords and NE most coords paste this after the last safe zone [code]||(absX >=**** && absX <=**** && absY >=**** && absY <=**** )||[/code]

change the first thing to the x sw coord
change the second one to the ne x coord
and do the same with the second one but y coords

PS.the x and the y may be the other way around so this do the Ys first

Read full topic
item.source: I wana make non wild area how?
